Event-createClassListener.sublime-snippe.description: Create a class based listener using the IoC container.

Event-fire.sublime-snippet.description: Fire an event and call the listeners.

Event-firing.sublime-snippet.description: Get the event that is currently firing.

Event-flush.sublime-snippet.description: Flush a set of pushed events.

Event-forget.sublime-snippet.description: Remove a set of listeners from the dispatcher.

Event-getListeners.sublime-snippet.description: Get all of the listeners for a given event name.

Event-hasListeners.sublime-snippet.description: Determine if a given event has listeners.

Event-listen.sublime-snippet.description: Register an event listener with the dispatcher.

Event-makeListener.sublime-snippet.description: Register an event listener with the dispatcher.

Event-push.sublime-snippet.description: Register an event and payload to be fired later.

Event-subscribe.sublime-snippet.description: Register an event subscriber with the dispatcher.

Event-until.sublime-snippet.description: Fire an event until the first non-null response is returned.
